name: Stay Hungry
summary_text: So-called 'special agent' infiltrates into the gym, which is targeted by a dirty business fraud.

name: The Strange Vice of Mrs. Wardh
summary_text: An ambassador's wife discovers that one of the men in her life - either her husband, an ex-lover or her current lover - may be a vicious serial killer.

name: The Valley of Gwangi
summary_text: A cowboy named Tuck Kirby seeks fame and fortune by capturing an Allosaurus living in the Forbidden Valley and putting it in a Mexican circus. His victim, called the Gwangi, turns out to have an aversion to being shown in public.

name: Electroma
summary_text: The journey of two robots on their quest to become human.

name: Scream of Fear
summary_text: A wheelchair-bound young woman returns to her father's estate after ten years, and although she's told he's away, she keeps seeing his dead body on the estate.

name: Keith Lemon: The Film
summary_text: Keith Lemon (Leigh Francis) is preparing to take his invention, the securipole, which he has been attempting to lift off the ground for twenty years, to a business convention in London. ...                See full summary »

name: Swordsman II
summary_text: Ling Wu Chung decides to hide from the chaotic world. Before leaving, he visits his friends, a tribe of snake-wielding women warriors. However, he finds that the tribe have been attacked, and their leader Yam Ying Ying has been abducted.

name: The Red Badge of Courage
summary_text: Truncated adaptation of Stephen Crane's novel about a Civil War Union soldier who stuggles to find the courage to fight in the heat of battle.

name: Bessie
summary_text: The story of legendary blues performer Bessie Smith, who rose to fame during the 1920s and '30s.

name: La corrispondenza
summary_text: Focused on the relationship between an astronomer and his lover, who spend their years apart.

name: Excuse My French
summary_text: A Christian kid suddenly is forced to go to a public school after his father dies and because of a misunderstanding everyone thinks that he's a Muslim.

name: Hardwired
summary_text: After a tragic accident nearly claims Luke Gibson's life the Hexx Corporation hardwire an implant into his brain to save him, but Luke soon finds out that this new technology comes at price.

name: The King of Fighters
summary_text: Live-action feature based on the video game "King of Fighters".

name: A Map of the World
summary_text: A woman's life falls apart after she's blamed for an accident on her property.

name: Popcorn
summary_text: A master of disguise deranged killer begins killing off the college students who are organizing a horror-movie marathon in an abandoned theater.

name: King Rat
summary_text: Fast-talking wheeler-dealer Corporal King is stuck in a Malaysian P.O.W. camp during World War II and uses bribery and larceny to take de-facto control of the camp.

name: The Bellboy
summary_text: Mute bellboy Stanley works at the luxurious Fontainebleau Hotel in Miami Beach. In spite of being a serviceable and friendly employee, the clumsy Stanley gets successively into trouble with his mistakes.

name: Wesele
summary_text: A wealthy small-town wiseguy organizes the wedding party for his daughter. As the party begins, unexpected events start to occur and disturb the party for the hosts and guests alike.

name: The Safety of Objects
summary_text: Meet four neighboring, suburban families, each with their own problems.

name: Addams Family Reunion
summary_text: The Addams Family goes on a search for their relatives.

name: Passport to Pimlico
summary_text: Residents of a part of London declare independence when they discover an old treaty. This leads to the need for a "Passport to Pimlico".

name: Solo
summary_text: Mario Van Peebles stars as an android killing weapon designed by the military and utilized to enter into a Latin American war to destroy the rebels - natives fighting simply to maintain ...                See full summary »

name: War of the Buttons
summary_text: The children of Ballydowse and Carrickdowse engage in battles where they cut of the buttons, shoe-laces and underwear of their captured opponents. This is to get the boys in trouble with ...                See full summary »

name: Appointment with Death
summary_text: When a former prison wardress who dominates the lives of her three adult stepchildren and her daughter is found dead at an archaeological dig near the Dead Sea, there are a great many suspects.

name: Waxwork II: Lost in Time
summary_text: In this sequel, a couple must use a portal through time to defeat evil.

name: La vie est un long fleuve tranquille
summary_text: A revengeful nurse switches a girl and a boy at birth. They are raised in two radically different families. When the switch is revealed many years later, the now teenagers and families need to cope with their new environments.

name: The Lost Honor of Katharina Blum
summary_text: A young woman's life is scrutinized by police and tabloid press after she spends the night with a suspected terrorist.

name: Monster Family
summary_text: Despite the title, the Wishbone family are far from happy. In an attempt to reconnect as a family, Mum and Emma plan a fun night out. However, her plan backfires when an evil witch curses them, and they're all turned into Monsters.

name: Der kommer en dag
summary_text: At the Orphanage Godhavn violence and humiliations plays a part of the everyday life. Based on real stories from Godhavn, where lots of boys were victims of violent and sexual abuse and medical neglect.

name: Alles is familie
summary_text: Finding themselves at a crossroads in their tumultuous lives, the members of a daftly dysfunctional family struggle to sort out their hopes, fears and expectations.

name: Still Mine
summary_text: An elderly couple fight against local authorities in rural New Brunswick to build their final home.

name: Dark Circles
summary_text: Alex and Penny are sick of the hectic city life and decide a move out to the country to raise their newborn child. But they don't expect the horrors threatening their relationship and family.

name: Selam: Bahara Yolculuk
summary_text: Follows a young teacher from Turkey whose goal is to establish a school in Kyrgyzstan.

name: Time to Hunt
summary_text: In the near future, a financial crisis will hit Korea and slums arise. From those areas, a group of young people commit crime to survive.

name: Rancho Notorious
summary_text: After the murder of his fiancée, a Wyoming ranch hand sets out to find her killer.

name: Passage to Marseille
summary_text: Five patriotic convicts are helped to escape imprisonment in Devil's Island so they can fight for occupied Free French forces against the Nazis.

name: A Dark Place
summary_text: When a young boy goes missing in a sleepy backwoods town, a local sanitation truck driver, Donald, plays detective, embarking on a precarious and obsessive investigation.

name: The Things of Life
summary_text: A highway engineer is involved in a car crash, after which, near death, he remembers his life leading up to the accident.

name: Jurassic Shark
summary_text: When an oil company unwittingly unleashes a prehistoric shark from its icy prison, the Jurassic killer maroons a group of thieves and beautiful young female college students on an abandoned island.

name: Flywheel
summary_text: A dishonest used car salesman decides to become the salesman that God wants him to be - with surprising results.

name: Michel Vaillant
summary_text: Fearless racer Michel Vaillant attempts to win "24 Hours of Le Mans", the famous highly challenging and prestigious annual endurance race that lasts one whole day.

name: Ode to Joy
summary_text: Charlie has a neurological disorder where strong emotions, especially joy, make him faint. He lives with his brother. Working as librarian gives him a quiet environment but then Francesca enters the library and his life.

name: Jeff Dunham: Spark of Insanity
summary_text: Jeff Dunham and his socially reckless "suitcase posse" are back in this highly anticipated follow-up to Jeff Dunham: Arguing with Myself (2006).

name: The Abortion
summary_text: Eda was a dance student attending an academy. When she was a student, she got pregnant from her lover Cihan who is already married and has a child. When she realized this, she learned that ...                See full summary »

name: Szabadság, szerelem
summary_text: At the 1956 Olympic Games in Melbourne, the Hungarian water polo team faces off against the Russians in what will become known as one of the bloodiest matches in the sport's history.

name: The Baby of Mâcon
summary_text: A movie about the corruption in all levels of society. A baby is born from a supposed-to-be virgin woman, so a chain of hysteria about divine intervention in the birth takes place.

name: Boomerang!
summary_text: The true story of a prosecutor's fight to prove the innocence of a man accused of a notorious murder.

name: Tout le monde debout
summary_text: Jocelyn is a successful businessman, selfish and misogynist. He tries to seduce a young pretty woman by pretending to be handicapped, till the day she presents him her sister in a wheelchair.

name: Heroine
summary_text: A female superstar struggles through the trials and tribulations of being a Bollywood actress.

name: Return of the Living Dead: Rave to the Grave
summary_text: A college student creates a drug called "Z" and sells it on campus, inadvertently resurrecting the living dead, who wreak havoc at a Halloween rave.

name: Z
summary_text: A family find themselves terrorized by their eight-year-old son's imaginary friend.

name: Dare
summary_text: A drama centered around three high school seniors - an aspiring actress, her misfit best friend, and a loner - who become engaged in an intimate and complicated relationship.

name: Tere Naal Love Ho Gaya
summary_text: Mini isn't eager to wed the rich suitor who's been chosen for her, so she stages her own kidnapping and runs off with a man who works for her father.

name: The Cheetah Girls: One World
summary_text: The girl group travel to India to star in a Bollywood movie - but end up competing for the same part.

name: Sunes sommar
summary_text: It's summer and Sune Anderssons family is planning a holiday in Greece. Sunes father, Rudolf is sulking because then he won't be able to go on his beloved fishing trip. But after seeing how...                See full summary »

name: Foxes
summary_text: A group of four teenage girls come of age in the asphalt desert of Los Angeles' San Fernando Valley arranged with a blazing soundtrack and endless drinking, drugs and sex.

name: Agatha and the Truth of Murder
summary_text: In 1926, with her personal life in tatters and her writing in crisis, a young Agatha Christie decides to solve a real-life murder.

name: Ghost House
summary_text: A young couple go on an adventurous vacation to Thailand only to find themselves haunted by a malevolent spirit after naively disrespecting a Ghost House.

name: Colour Photo
summary_text: A tragic-comedy that is set in the 90s between two different personalities coming from different backgrounds that change their lives in a tale of love.

name: Zona Zamfirova
summary_text: The plot follows the story of Zona Zamfirova (Katarina Radivojevic), a local rich man's daughter, and the vicissitudes of her affair with Mane (Vojin Cetkovic), an ordinary goldsmith. As it...                See full summary »

name: The Evil Eye
summary_text: A mystery novel-loving American tourist witnesses a murder in Rome, and soon finds herself and her suitor caught up in a series of killings.

name: The Night Is Short, Walk on Girl
summary_text: In this comedy about one epic night in Kyoto, a college sophomore goes on a series of surreal encounters with the local nightlife, all the while unaware of the romantic longings of her classmate Senpai.

name: Christopher and His Kind
summary_text: How real-life British-American author Christopher Isherwood and his German boyfriend Heinz met and fell in love during the 1930s and the rise of Nazism.

name: On the Edge
summary_text: On the Edge is about suicidal patients discovering their true selves while going through therapy in a treatment center.

name: Drácula
summary_text: Centuries-old vampire Dracula preys upon the innocent Eva and her friends.

name: Lone Wolf and Cub: Baby Cart in Peril
summary_text: Ogami is hired to kill a tattooed female assassin. Gunbei Yagyu, an enemy samurai, happens upon Ogami's son, and sees his chance for revenge.

name: Raise the Titanic
summary_text: They said nothing could sink her--then, that no one could reach her. But an underwater research agency, headed by Admiral James Sandecker, is assigned the job of finding the doomed ship in her North Atlantic grave.

name: Solarbabies
summary_text: In a post-apocalyptic future ruled by the military, a group of renegade teenage orphans find a legendary orb, Bohdai, that can supposedly bring the rain back to dried up Earth.

name: My New Partner
summary_text: A moderately corrupt veteran policeman teaches the art of bribes to his young partner. The rookie turns out to be an extremely capable student, and soon overtakes the teacher.

name: Cold Blood
summary_text: A hit-man lives isolated in a cabin at the edge of a lake. One day, an injured woman arrives in front of his house. To save her, he could well risk his own life.

name: Weirdsville
summary_text: A pair of slackers get in way over their heads when they try to dump the body of a dead girlfriend in the basement of a drive-in movie theater where a satanic cult performs ritual sacrifices.

name: Groove
summary_text: An inside look into one night in the San Francisco underground rave scene.

name: The Aerial
summary_text: This near-silent black and white film from Argentina tells the story of a city that has lost its voice, stolen by Mr. TV, and the attempts of a small family to win the voice back. Similar in design to early German expressionist films.

name: Kim Possible: A Sitch in Time
summary_text: The new school year starts off terrible for Kim. In her ordinary life her best friend is moving away, and in her heroic crime-fighting life, three of the most notorious villains in her world plan to use time travel as a weapon against her.

name: Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega...
summary_text: Raj is a struggling singer with big dreams who is still waiting for his big break. One night he witnesses an accident where a car spins out of control and lands on the tracks of an ...                See full summary »

name: Guan yun chang
summary_text: The story of legendary Guan Yu crossing five passes & slaying six generals. He played a major role in the civil war that led to the collapse of Han Dynasty & the establishment of Shu Han of the 3 Kingdoms, making Liu Bei its first emperor.

name: The Courageous Heart of Irena Sendler
summary_text: The story of Irena Sendler, a social worker who was part of the Polish underground during World War II and was arrested by the Nazis for saving the lives of nearly 2,500 Jewish children by smuggling them out of the Warsaw ghetto.

name: Felidae
summary_text: A cat must investigate brutal murders of other cats in a neighborhood he has moved into with his owner.

name: Carjacked
summary_text: A single mom and her child are carjacked by a bank robber.

name: Turn the Other Cheek
summary_text: Two unusual missionaries in NW Venezuela help their flock sell their crop and are never afraid of a fight to protect their flock from an evil, corrupt governor.

name: Joe Rogan: Triggered
summary_text: Unleashing his inquisitive, intense comedic style, Rogan explores everything from raising kids and Santa Claus to pot gummies and talking to dolphins.

name: Partir
summary_text: Suzanne "Dame Kristin Scott Thomas" is a well to do married mother, but her bourgeois lifestyle gets her down and she decides to go back to work as a physiotherapist by building an office in their backyard. Then Suzanne falls in love with the man hired to build the office.

name: Don's Plum
summary_text: A group of Los Angeles teenagers meet every week at their local diner to discuss their latest misadventures in their miserable lives.

name: Invincible
summary_text: A Jewish strongman performs in Berlin as the blond Aryan hero Siegfried.

name: The Devil-Doll
summary_text: An escaped convict uses miniaturized humans to wreak vengeance on those that framed him.

name: Zorro: The Gay Blade
summary_text: Zorro, the legendary swordsman, has passed on his weapon and his sense of duty to his noble son, Diego, a dashing swashbuckler like his father. But after an injury sidelines Diego, he is forced to hand the mask over to his twin, Ramon.

name: Dark Touch
summary_text: In a remote Irish village, police are called to the scene of a bloody massacre, but they ignore the lone survivor's claim that the house was responsible for the carnage that killed her parents and brother.

name: The Attack
summary_text: An Arab surgeon living in Tel Aviv discovers a dark secret about his wife in the aftermath of a suicide bombing.

name: The Sea Wolves
summary_text: During World War II, the British must attack a German ship, but it's safe in neutral Goa. As a result, they send civilians: former soldiers who are about sixty years old.

name: Apache
summary_text: Refusing to let himself be re-settled on a Florida reservation, Massai, an Apache warrior, escapes his captors and returns to his homeland to become a peaceful farmer.

name: Out of the Dark
summary_text: A couple and their daughter move to Colombia to take over a family manufacturing plant, only to realize their new home is haunted.

name: Simindis kundzuli
summary_text: The river creates and the river destroys in an eternal cycle that even man can't escape.

name: Awe!
summary_text: Unusual(multiple) persons tend to meet at a Restaurant and their life-changing moments take place in order to know about a single person.

name: Aiyaary
summary_text: After finding out about an illegal arms deal, a military intelligence officer goes rogue with highly sensitive data related to his organization, causing his mentor: a colonel, to hunt him down.

name: The River Murders
summary_text: While investigating a series of murders, a homicide detective becomes the prime suspect when the FBI uncovers his close personal ties to all the victims.

name: Furie
summary_text: Veronica Ngo stars as an ex-gangster who is lying low in the countryside after becoming a mother, but she can't escape her violent past when her daughter is kidnapped.

name: Tu hijo
summary_text: When his son is sent to the hospital after being hit by strangers, a father tries to find them regardless of the consequences.

name: PTU
summary_text: When an obnoxious detective loses his gun to four young thugs, it's up to the P.T.U. (Police Tactical Unit) and their iron-willed leader to recover the weapon and clean up the mess before daybreak.

name: The Outlaw
summary_text: Western legends Pat Garrett, Doc Holliday and Billy the Kid are played against each other over the law and the attentions of vivacious country vixen Rio McDonald.

name: Handsome: A Netflix Mystery Movie
summary_text: Gene Handsome is an LA homicide detective who tries to make sense of his life as he solves crime. Handsome's knack for solving mysteries is matched only by his inability to make sense of his own problems.

name: Romulus, My Father
summary_text: It tells the story of Romulus, his beautiful wife, Christina, and their struggle in the face of great adversity to bring up their son, Raimond. It is a story of impossible love that ultimately celebrates the unbreakable bond between father and son.

name: Simple Men
summary_text: Bitter about being double-crossed by the women he loved, (and with the police after him to boot), Bill vows to seduce the next woman he sees, then throw her away. His brother Dennis, ...                See full summary »

name: Body Parts
summary_text: After losing his arm in a car accident, a criminal psychologist has it replaced with a limb that belonged to a serial killer.

name: I Wake Up Screaming

name: Svartur á leik
summary_text: After being reacquainted with a childhood friend Stebbi joins the drug trade world in order to pay off his debt. Inspired by actual events.

name: Murder-Set-Pieces
summary_text: A fashion photographer exposes his demented childhood and zooms his evil lens on the oldest profession under the moon, in quite possibly the most notorious serial killer film ever made.

summary_text: After railroad agents forcibly evict the James family from their family farm, Jesse and Frank turn to banditry for revenge.

summary_text: Two disreputable friends get tied in with a group of criminals who turn out to be excessively violent and deceptive.

name: Once Upon a Crime...

summary_text: Comedian Ali Wong performs her live stand-up set at Toronto's Winter Garden Theatre.

name: Overnight Republic

name: The Pirate Movie
summary_text: The crew of a large ship sail the high seas encountering other pirates from other ships. The boy from the ship ends up having to save his girlfriend who is kidnapped by a bunch of other pirates.

summary_text: A band of Mexican gun-runners employed by a revolutionary general accept an American into their gang, unaware of his intentions.

name: Teen Beach 2
summary_text: Modern day teens Mack and Brady get a real world visit from Lela, Tanner, Butchy, and other surfer and biker pals from the beach party film within a film, Wet Side Story.

name: The Immortal
summary_text: Ciro's body is slowly sinking in the Gulf of Naples. As he plunges into darkness, memories emerge.

name: Virtuality
summary_text: The crew of spaceship begin to die because of unknown defect in a virtual reality device.

name: Fubar
summary_text: Headbangers Terry and Dean explore the depths of friendship, and the art and science of drinking beer like a man.

name: The Six Million Dollar Man
summary_text: After an astronaut and test pilot is catastrophically mutilated in a test plane crash, he is rebuilt and equipped with nuclear powered bionic limbs and implants.

name: The Happiest Day in the Life of Olli Maki
summary_text: The true story of Olli Mäki, the famous Finnish boxer who had a shot at the 1962 World Featherweight title.

name: Paper Planes
summary_text: An imaginative children's film about a young Australian boy's passion for flight and his challenge to compete in the World Paper Plane Championships in Japan.

summary_text: A bereaved Satanist couple kidnap a pregnant woman so they can use an ancient spellbook to put their dead grandson's spirit into her unborn child but end up summoning more than they bargained for.

name: Plan B

name: Ghayal
summary_text: Ajay Mehra, an amateur boxer, takes revenge against Balwant Rai, a crooked businessman, after his elder brother is killed.

name: The Docks of New York
summary_text: A blue-collar worker on New York's depressed waterfront finds his life changed after he saves a woman attempting suicide.

name: Full Moon in Paris
summary_text: Louise, a young woman, who recently finished her studies in arts, is working as a interior decorator trainee. Playing the game of seduction, her life becomes more and more complicated.

name: The Black Swan
summary_text: An ex-pirate contends with rowdy buccaneers and a love-hate relationship with an aristocratic woman who's tougher than she seems.

name: Uno

name: Brain Donors
summary_text: Three manic idiots; a lawyer, cab driver and a handyman team up to run a ballet company to fulfill the will of a millionaire. Stooge-like antics result as the trio try to outwit the rich widow.

name: Pottersville
summary_text: Maynard, a beloved local businessman, is mistaken for the legendary Bigfoot during an inebriated romp through town in a makeshift gorilla costume.

name: Ambush

name: Highway to Hell
summary_text: An eloping bride is taken into Hell, and her fiancé must pursue.

name: Tiger House
summary_text: Kelly sneaks into her boyfriend's house but tonight, she's not the only unwelcome visitor. As the situation spirals out of control, the suburban house becomes a terrifying arena for violence.

name: Chris Rock: Kill the Messenger - London, New York, Johannesburg
summary_text: Chris Rock's 2008 comedy tour visits London, New York and Johannesburg. Various parts of this tour are edited together to create his fifth HBO stand-up special.

name: Kim Possible: So the Drama
summary_text: Kim's heart is quickly captured by the new boy, Eric, who soon becomes her boyfriend. Unknown to Kim, her best friend and sidekick, Ron has developed stronger feelings toward her.

name: My Best Friend's Birthday
summary_text: It's Mickey's Birthday and his girlfriend just left him, so that's when his friend Clarence shows him a birthday he'll never forget.

name: If These Walls Could Talk
summary_text: The movie examines the abortion issue through three stories set in different eras: 1952, 1974 and 1996.

name: The Dark Corner
summary_text: A secretary tries to help her boss, who is framed for a murder.

name: Our Friend
summary_text: After receiving life-altering news, a couple finds unexpected support from their best friend, who puts his own life on hold and moves into their family home, bringing an impact much greater and more profound than anyone could have imagined

name: 4 Moons
summary_text: Four stories of love and disgust between men of different generations facing their conflicts and their fears

name: An Invisible Sign
summary_text: Mona Gray is a 20-year-old loner who, as a child, turned to math for salvation after her father became ill. As an adult, Mona now teaches the subject and must help her students through their own crises.

name: Vénus beauté (institut)
summary_text: Employees of a beauty parlor in search of love and happiness.

name: She's Out of Control
summary_text: When an average-looking teenage girl gets a makeover, it's enough to make her father become overprotective of her.

name: Android Kunjappan Ver 5.25
summary_text: Story of a conventional, conservative small town villager and his son who has to move away from home due to his profession. Their relationship gets an endearing twist when an AI humanoid enters their lives and fills in their emptiness.

name: Rovdyr
summary_text: The summer of 1974, four young people are all ambushed and left unconscious. They wake up deep in the woods with no one around but the sound of a hunting horn.

name: Avenue Montaigne
summary_text: A young woman arrives in Paris where she finds a job as a waitress in bar next on Avenue Montaigne that caters to the surrounding theaters and the wealthy inhabitants of the area. She will meet a pianist, a famous actress and a great art collector, and become acquainted with the "luxurious" world her grandmother has told her about since her childhood.

name: Dil Hai Ki Manta Nahin
summary_text: Runaway heiress in search of her beloved falls in love with another man on the way.

name: Sauvage / Wild
summary_text: Leo is 22 and sells his body on the street for a bit of cash. The men come and go, and he stays right here - longing for love. He doesn't know what the future will bring. He hits the road. His heart is pounding.

name: The Willow Tree
summary_text: Youssef, a blind university professor, is suddenly diagnosed with a fatal disease and must undergo treatment in France. Back home, will he find the life he had before?

name: Love and a .45
summary_text: A small time crook flees to Mexico to evade the authorities, loan sharks, and his murderous ex-partner with only his fiancé and a trusted Colt .45.

name: August
summary_text: August centers on two brothers fighting to keep their start-up company afloat on Wall Street during August 2001, a month before the 9/11 terrorist attacks.

name: Gracie
summary_text: A teenager faces an uphill battle when she fights to give women the opportunity to play competitive soccer.

name: Zero Day
summary_text: Two troubled adolescents chronicle the events that ultimately lead up to a terrifying assault on their school.

name: Splitting Heirs
summary_text: A duke dies and leaves the title and wealth to his adult son. But who's the real son: the found baby raised in USA or the abandoned baby raised by a Hindi family in London? Comedy follows.

name: Deliha
summary_text: For the first time in Turkey a comedy actress plays a character of her own creation on screen. Deliha follows the hilarious exploits of a slightly crazy, decidedly droll and genuinely ...                See full summary »

name: A Royal Christmas
summary_text: Prince Leopold, heir to the throne of Cordinia, wishes to marry his young love Emily Taylor, a humble seamstress from Philadelphia. But Leopold's mother, Queen Isadora has other plans for her son.

name: Touch of Pink
summary_text: A gay Canadian living in London has his perfectly crafted life upset when his devoutly Muslim mother comes to visit.

name: The Jaguar
summary_text: Two Frenchmen must go to South America to save the local shaman's soul from the evil forces.

name: Die Nibelungen: Kriemhild's Revenge
summary_text: After Siegfried's dead, Kriemhild marries Etzel, the King of the Huns. She gives birth to a child, and invites her brothers for a party. She tries to persuade Etzel and the other Huns, that...                See full summary »

name: Mirchi
summary_text: A man returns to his country in order, ostensibly, to reform his girlfriend's violent family, but he seems to have a strange connection and a rather dark past.

name: Yamla Pagla Deewana
summary_text: A married Canadian travels to India to re-unite with his estranged father and brother but faces obstacles and challenges.

name: Tidal Wave
summary_text: A woman named Yeon-hee (Ha Ji-won) lives in Busan with her boyfriend Man-sik (Sol Kyung-gu) near Haeundae Beach. But, when they find out a tsunami will hit the city, They realize they only have 10 minutes to escape!

name: The Cake General
summary_text: Set in 1984, Hans Pettersson (Hasse P.) decides to create the largest sandwich cake ever made in order to put his home town, Köping, on the map.

name: Clara
summary_text: An obsessive astronomer and a curious artist form an unlikely bond which leads them to a profound, scientific discovery.

name: Coldwater
summary_text: A teenage boy is sent to a juvenile reform facility in the wilderness. As we learn about the tragic events that sent him there, his struggle becomes one for survival with the inmates, counselors, and the retired war colonel in charge.

name: Another Happy Day
summary_text: A wedding at her parents' Annapolis estate hurls high-strung Lynn into the center of touchy family dynamics.

name: The League of Gentlemen
summary_text: A disgruntled veteran recruits a group of disgraced colleagues to perform a bank robbery with military precision.

name: The Drawn Together Movie: The Movie!
summary_text: Eight housemates on a fake animated reality TV show realize they've been canceled and set off on a journey to get back on the air.

name: Hamilton
summary_text: A nuclear armed SS20 will be smuggled from Russia via Finland to Sweden unless Swedish agent Hamilton +5 stop them with "no loose ends". What about the other stolen SS20?

name: Sex & Drugs & Rock & Roll
summary_text: A biography of Ian Dury, who was stricken with polio at a young age and defied expectations by becoming one of the founders of the punk-rock scene in Britain in the 1970s.

name: Moll Flanders
summary_text: The daughter of a thief, young Moll is placed in the care of a nunnery after the execution of her mother. However, the actions of an abusive Priest lead Moll to rebel as a teenager, ...                See full summary »

name: Companeros
summary_text: A Swedish arms dealer and a Mexican peon team up to rescue the intellectual leader of the Revolutionary cause, while taking part in numerous misadventures along the way.

name: Band of Robbers
summary_text: Tom Sawyer and Huck Finn are grown men, still searching for the hidden treasure that has eluded them since childhood.

name: United Passions
summary_text: Follows the passing of the FIFA baton through three association presidents: Jules Rimet, Joao Havelange, and Sepp Blatter.

name: The Forty-Year-Old Version
summary_text: Radha is a down-on-her-luck NY playwright, who is desperate for a breakthrough before 40. Reinventing herself as rapper RadhaMUSPrime, she vacillates between the worlds of Hip Hop and theater in order to find her true voice.

name: Echo Park LA
summary_text: As Magdalena's 15th birthday approaches, her simple, blissful life is complicated by the discovery that she's pregnant. Kicked out of her house, she finds a new family with her great-granduncle and gay cousin.

name: Vabank
summary_text: Set in Warsaw in 1930's. After six years in jail, framed for bank robbery by an accomplice, the legendary Kwinto has only revenge on his mind. He is a safecracker in the old style, a thief ...                See full summary »

name: Accident
summary_text: At Oxford, Austrian student Anna von Graz (Jacqueline Sassard) is dating fellow student William (Michael York), whom she plans to marry, but she ends up sleeping with two unhappily married Oxford professors instead.

name: Humoresque
summary_text: A classical musician from the slums is sidetracked by his love for a wealthy, neurotic socialite.

name: Z-O-M-B-I-E-S
summary_text: Students from Zombietown are transferred to a high school in a suburban town preoccupied with uniformity, traditions and pep rallies.

name: Buried Alive
summary_text: A husband finds out that his wife and her lover are trying to kill him.

name: Icarus
summary_text: A Soviet-trained assassin is determined to escape his double life as a hitman and as a husband-father.

name: Manuale d'am3re
summary_text: In Italy 3 men fall in love with 3 different women. First a young engaged lawyer has a fling then ditto with the 2nd married middle-aged man. 3rd story: a retired man/R.D.Niro falls in love with his friend's daughter/M.Bellucci.

name: Lissi und der wilde Kaiser
summary_text: A send-up of the Sissi trilogy.

name: Tank
summary_text: Sergeant Major Zack arrives at a new army base with his wife, son and Sherman tank. One night at a bar he "stops" a pimp/deputy from beating a girl. The corrupt sheriff uses Zack's son for revenge and Zack uses his tank.

name: Altar
summary_text: A young family moves to an isolated house which the wife has been hired to restore, only to discover that the previous owner is reputed to have murdered his wife.

name: The Challenger Disaster
summary_text: Factual drama exploring the truth behind the space shuttle Challenger's 1986 disintegration.

name: Schutzengel
summary_text: A troubled veteran from the war in Afghanistan works to protect an orphaned teenager who witnessed a murder from the killer's henchmen.

name: Shadows in the Sun
summary_text: An aspiring young writer (Jackson) tracks a literary titan (Keitel) suffering from writers block to his refuge in rural Italy and learns about life and love from the irascible genius and his daughters.

name: Same Old Song
summary_text: A musical story about how people find their love on the streets of beautiful Paris.

name: Mothra
summary_text: An expedition to Infant Island discovers a native population and tiny twin priestesses of the island's mythical deity. Named Mothra, she sets out on a rampage to rescue her priestesses after they're kidnapped by a greedy businessman.

name: Appropriate Behavior
summary_text: Shirin is struggling to become an ideal Persian daughter, politically correct bisexual and hip young Brooklynite but fails miserably in her attempt at all identities. Being without a cliché to hold onto can be a lonely experience.

name: Once Around
summary_text: Renata Bella feels like a failure at life and career. But when Renata attends a seminar on selling real estate, she finally finds True Love. Sam Sharpe, while a top-notch, successful ...                See full summary »

name: Heaven Help Us
summary_text: A new transfer student to St. Basil's Boys' Prep School tries to fit in while romantically pursuing a troubled young girl.

name: Papa ou maman
summary_text: Florence and Vincent Leroy are successful in business, marriage and children. Today, it's their divorce they want to succeed in.

name: Strings
summary_text: A Prince leaves his city and sets off to avenge his father, not aware his father wasn't murdered, and in reality, committed suicide, and soon learns the truth about his people from a warrior woman.

name: Blackball
summary_text: A rebellious young British bowls player teams with another older and more traditional player to take on the Australian bowls team.

name: Story of Women
summary_text: A housewife in Nazi-occupied France struggles to make ends meet when her husband returns home after being wounded in the war.

name: Fun with Dick and Jane
summary_text: When an upwardly mobile couple find themselves unemployed and in debt, they turn to armed robbery in desperation.

name: East of Shanghai
summary_text: Believing that an unexpected inheritance will bring them happiness, a married couple instead finds their relationship strained to the breaking point.

name: Czlowiek z marmuru
summary_text: A young Polish filmmaker sets out to find out what happened to Mateusz Birkut, a bricklayer who became a propaganda hero in the 1950s but later fell out of favor and disappeared.

name: Sonny
summary_text: An honorably discharged soldier returns home to New Orleans, hoping to break away from his upbringing as a trained prostitute, but his brothel-madam mother has other expectations.

name: Boccaccio '70
summary_text: Inspired by Boccaccio's novellas, each episode focuses on sex, love and seduction in Italy's 1960s, an era of economic growth and major cultural changes.

name: Crisis
summary_text: Three stories about the world of opioids collide: a drug trafficker arranges a multi-cartel Fentanyl smuggling operation between Canada and the U.S., an architect recovering from an ...                See full summary »

name: Svecenikova djeca
summary_text: A young priest gets an idea to pierce condoms before they are sold in order to increase the birth rate of his island.

name: Liz & Dick
summary_text: The torrid relationship between Elizabeth Taylor and Richard Burton.

name: Mr. Jones
summary_text: A young couple moves to the woods and soon finds their nightmares and reality colliding.

name: Separate Lies
summary_text: A couple's marriage is complicated by the introduction of a third party.

name: Pure Country
summary_text: Dusty gets tired of all the smoke and light effects, wonders what happened to doing it the way that made him famous and happy. Takes a walk to find what seems to be missing and finds himself and his music again!

name: Mary, Queen of Scots
summary_text: During the sixteenth century, the Catholic Mary, Queen of Scots engages in over two decades of religious and political conflict with her cousin, the Protestant Queen Elizabeth I of England, amidst political intrigue in her native land.

name: Beneath
summary_text: Six high school seniors celebrating in the middle of a lake find themselves trapped on a rowboat due to a man-eating fish.

name: Benji
summary_text: Two school kids strike up a friendship with an orphaned puppy named Benji. When danger befalls them and they end up kidnapped by robbers who are in over their heads, Benji and his scruffy sidekick come to the rescue.

name: Cairo 678
summary_text: Unfolds the poignant story of three women and their search for justice from the daily plight of sexual harassment in Egypt.

name: The White Buffalo
summary_text: At the closing of 1874 a haunted, dying Wild Bill Hickok teams up with a grieving Crazy Horse to hunt a murderous albino buffalo.

name: Scent of a Woman
summary_text: An army cadet accompanies an irascible, blind captain on a week-long trip from Turin to Naples. The captain, Fausto, who wants no pity, brooks no disagreement, and charges into every ...                See full summary »

name: Taking Off
summary_text: While searching for their runaway teenage daughter, the parents rediscover life's joys as they get acquainted with a self-help group for parents of vanished children.

name: Billy Budd
summary_text: Billy Budd is an innocent, naive seaman in the British Navy in 1797. When the ship's sadistic master-at-arms is murdered, Billy is accused and tried.

name: Raw Meat
summary_text: When a government official disappears in the London tunnels, after several reports of missing people in the same location, Scotland Yard start to take the matter seriously, along with a couple who stumble into a victim by accident.

name: Wrong Turn at Tahoe
summary_text: A small-time crime boss kills a drug dealer without realizing that the drug dealer works for the biggest crime boss in the country.

name: Brain Dead
summary_text: In a showdown of man versus machine, Martin plunges into a chaotic nightmare trying to save his mind from the megalomaniacal corporation.

name: Pathemari
summary_text: Narrates both the hardships and happiness that Gulf life has provided to Malayalees. The period from 1960 to the present form the context of the story.

name: Poison
summary_text: A boy shoots his father and flies out the window. A man falls in love with a fellow inmate in prison. A doctor accidentally ingests his experimental sex serum, wreaking havoc on the community.

name: Target
summary_text: When American Donna Lloyd is kidnapped during a trip to Europe, her son Chris and her husband Walter start searching for her.

name: Gaslight
summary_text: Twenty years after the murder of Alice Barlow, her house is finally occupied again. However, the husband from the couple who have moved in has a secret which he will do anything to keep hidden.

name: A Flying Jatt
summary_text: Jatt is a reluctant superhero who fights crime and protects people. He meets his match in the evil Raka, who he must vanquish to save the day.

name: Blood
summary_text: Thriller charting the moral collapse of a police family. Two cop brothers, smothered by the shadow of their former police chief father, must investigate a crime they themselves have committed.

name: Leave It to Beaver
summary_text: The several misadventures and life-lessons learned by 8-year-old Theodore "Beaver" Cleaver in an entertaining and hilarious tale of a small-town Ohio family and the daily trials and tribunes of life.

name: Repentance
summary_text: Varlam, the despotic mayor of a small town, dies. After his funeral, his body is repeatedly unearthed and buried again. Through flashbacks and dreamlike scenes, we witness his rise, power and ambiguities.

name: Death Ship
summary_text: A mysterious ghostly freighter rams and sinks a modern day cruise ship whose survivors climb aboard the freighter and discover that it is a World War II Nazi torture vessel.

name: Les Dames du Bois de Boulogne
summary_text: A society lady engineers a marriage between her lover and a cabaret dancer who is essentially a prostitute.

name: ZMD: Zombies of Mass Destruction
summary_text: Life is wonderful for the people in the quiet, island town of Port Gamble....until a zombie virus outbreak!

name: Shao Lin si
summary_text: A young man, hounded by a psychopathic general, learns martial arts at the Shaolin temple to avenge his father's death. To achieve this he forgoes a budding romance with his kungfu master's daughter, a shepherdess.

name: Barry Munday
summary_text: Barry Munday wakes up after being attacked to realize that he's missing his family jewels. To make matters worse, he learns he's facing a paternity lawsuit filed by a woman he can't remember having sex with.

name: Birlesen Gönüller
summary_text: A look inside the story of two newlyweds who are parted from each other and spend the next half-century of their lives trying to reunite.

name: Rails & Ties
summary_text: A deadly collision between a train and car lead to an unlikely bond between the train engineer and a young boy who escapes the carnage.

name: Jesse Stone: Death in Paradise
summary_text: A body's found on the shore of a lake. Police Chief Jesse Stone starts an investigation. It turns out to be a pregnant high school student. There's also a case of a persistent wife beater. Jesse starts seeing a shrink and dating.

name: Break Ke Baad
summary_text: Aaliya is not ready for commitment even after a decade-long friendship with Abhay. She remains indifferent when he follows her to Australia, but is finally shaken when he announces his marriage.

name: Musallat
summary_text: The story of a young couple haunted by mysterious forces and there looks to be a heavy possession element as well. The calm life of Suat and Nurcan is broken when they begin to be scared by supernatural creatures.

name: Dead Man Running
summary_text: Nick's borrowed money from a loan shark. He's 4 weeks behind. He gets 24 hours to come up with GBP100,000. His mom's a hostage.

name: Permission
summary_text: A woman on the brink of a marriage proposal is told by a friend that she should date other men before spending the rest of her life with her boyfriend.

name: Nomads
summary_text: A French anthropologist specializing in nomadic groups moves to Los Angeles with his wife, and starts following a group of sinister street punks who seem to live and move around in a black van. But they aren't what they seem.

name: We Go On
summary_text: Miles Grissom offers $30,000 to the first person who can prove to him that we go on after death.

name: Raja Natwarlal
summary_text: A small-time con man seeks assistance from his mentor with the intention of settling scores with a gangster.

name: The Mother
summary_text: A woman has a passionate affair with a man half her age, who is also sleeping with her daughter.

name: Dating Amber
summary_text: Two school friends decide to start a pretend straight relationship in an effort to fit in.

name: Lucky Luke
summary_text: Fearless gunslinger Lucky Luke is ordered by the President to bring peace to Daisy Town.

name: The New Adventures of Pippi Longstocking
summary_text: After her father's ship is carried off by a sudden storm, the spunky Pippi Longstocking is stranded with her horse, Alfonso, and monkey, Mr. Nilsson, and takes up residence in the old ...                See full summary »

name: Saheb Biwi Aur Gangster
summary_text: Hired to kill a nobleman, the assassin instead falls for the former's unstable wife.

name: The Outcasts
summary_text: After falling victim to a humiliating prank by the high school Queen Bee, best friends and world-class geeks, Mindy and Jodi, decide to get their revenge by uniting the outcasts of the school against her and her circle of friends.
